text: So LongTomorrow is my last day  I m going to wake up and call my closest friend and tell him I love him  I m going to finish writing my note and then watch my favourite film  I m going to kiss my mum and dad and send them out of the house  I m going to order my favourite food and eat in front of the TV with the AC on  When I get tired I will leave the hallway light on for my parents and retire to my bedroom  I will set my note on my little table  shut off the light  crawl into bed and go to sleep forever   I hope death is a wonderful painless dream in which I do not have to think  I hope there is devastation and celebration in my wake   Goodbye All

text: Took my moms car out in hopes to end it It s currently   here and about two to three hours ago I took my moms car out for a drive with a bottle of extra strength Tylenol in my hand  Quick backstory  the place I m going is where my dad died a few years ago while driving and he fell asleep  so my plan was to go there  down the Tylenol and hope that he brings me up with him  my dad was a train conductor and has worked with trains for many years  keep that train part in mind  on my way from the highway across the train tracks onto a secondary road  I started hearing dinging  thought to myself ah fuck a train of course  but whatever because usually the trains down here are quick and short we usually came down her about   times a week to visit my grandma and grandpa so trains were not a very special occurrence  but the train stopped  not for long but just long enough for you to notice it   seconds max it was at a complete halt  I thought to myself  k weird I ve never seen that before  like I said before usually the trains are short and quick but this one was going max   kmh  and long  wayyyyy longer than the others  but I shrugged it off and just said I m not gonna let a train stand in my way  that was until I ve heard something I ve never heard before  me and my dad had a handshake it was kind of boring but it was just three slaps  staring contest then two slaps  I heard the train whistle or horn whatever u call it  go two short honks  then three short honks  and that scared the absolute shit outta me  I definetely took that as a sign even tho it was in the wrong order  visited my dads death spot and turned around  going about   in a   cause speed makes me happy and makes me forget about my worries  I took that as a sign not to kill my self  and I m still suicidal but I m gonna tough it out
summary: Took his mom's car for a drive to the place where his dad died a few years ago. His dad was a train conductor and worked with trains for many years.
